title: The Last starfighter
creator_credit: Nick Castle, Edward Denault, Gary Adelson, Universal Pictures and Lorimar Film Entertainment
brief_description: A highly underrated science fiction produced in the wake of the Star Wars phenomenon, “The Last starfighter” is another supreme example of outer-space/fantasy that was the trend in Hollywood in the early 1980s. Lance Guest is Alex Rogan, who lives and works a dead-end job in his mother’s trailer park. His only escape: a video-game called “Starfighter”. When a mysterious stranger explains to him that “Starfighter” is more than just a game, Alex is thrust centrestage for a conflict that threatens not only Earth but the entire universe. With production design by Ron Cobb (of ‘Alien’ and ‘Star Wars’ fame) and a scorching soundtrack by Craig Safan, “The Last starfighter” is formulaic Hollywood at its most entertaining. Cast also includes Robert Preston, Dan O’Herlihy, Catherine Stewart and Barbara Bosson.
